title: Please comment on the approximate boundaries of the former Masonboro 1 voting precinct as well as the numbers of the new precincts formed to replace it when the Pine Valley area was annexed to the city in the 1980\'s.
text:
Andy, I think MyReporter will have to pass on this question. It's
possible you may be able to get the answer from the New Hanover County
Elections Board, but that's going back pretty far in history.
